documentation.text:
@title ElectionFactory
 @dev Factory contract for deploying new Election contracts

@dev Get the number of elections created
 @return The total number of elections

@dev Get all election addresses
 @return An array of all election addresses

devdoc.details: Factory contract for deploying new Election contracts

createElection(string,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Create a new election contract and store its address

params._endTime: End time of the election as Unix timestamp
params._positionIds: Array of position IDs to include in the election
params._startTime: Start time of the election as Unix timestamp

returns._0: The address of the created election contract
An array of all election addresses

getElection(uint256).details: Get an election address by index

returns._0: The address of the election at the specified index

getElectionCount().details: Get the number of elections created

devdoc.title: ElectionFactory
